reviewText: This film was a surprising little gem I'd never heard of before. There are songs, lovely british ladies, lots of laughs and fun all around. The print is pristine. It's British all the way, but seems what I might call "Americanized" in that sometimes I can't get British dialogue in films, but this one was clear and understandable. For me this is a keeper which I will watch again and again because it feels good to watch it! DVD arrived in perfect condition and fast delivery.
What a great little film this is, and the transfer is BEAUTIFUL! Looks to have come from an import DVD that used 35mm elements. Looks great, sounds great and a lot of fun to watch. Don't pass it up!
